casebody.data:
EDITH M. ELLIS et al. v. WILLIAM R. PURNELL, et al. [No. 55,

October Term, 1934.]

Decided January 15th, 1935.

The cause was argued before Bond, C.J., Urner, Offutt, Parke, and Sloan, JJ.

L. Paul Ewell, for the appellants. Thomas F. Johnson, with whom were Edmond H. Johnson and William H. Scott on the brief, for the appellees. Sloan, J.,

delivered the opinion of the court.
